meanings.definition: Covered in or full of burrs.
meanings.sent1: The dog's fur was burry after running through the bushes.
meanings.sent2: The sweater felt rough and burry against my skin.
meanings.sent3: The burry fabric made the chair uncomfortable to sit on.
meanings.sent4: The burry texture of the carpet reminded me of walking on tiny thorns.
meanings.sent5: The burry surface of the fruit made it difficult to hold.

meanings.sent1: The burry plant in the garden looked prickly and rough.
meanings.sent2: The burry texture of the painting gave it a unique and interesting look.
meanings.sent3: The burry design on the wallpaper made it stand out in the room.
meanings.sent4: The burry pattern on the fabric felt like touching tiny spikes.
meanings.sent5: The burry appearance of the tree bark made it blend in with the forest.

meanings.definition: To cover or become covered with burrs.
meanings.sent1: As I walked through the field, my socks started to burry with burrs.
meanings.sent2: The cat managed to burry itself in the pile of leaves in the backyard.
meanings.sent3: I accidentally burry my clothes with burrs while hiking in the woods.
meanings.sent4: The blanket seemed to burry itself in the burrs of the couch.
meanings.sent5: The bushes seemed to burry the path with their prickly burrs.
